languages.text: "Но обмен был первой частью сделки. О второй — про устранение ненужных свидетелей — я, конечно же, умолчал. Нельзя оставлять в живых того, кто сдаст тебя с потрохами, стоит приставить нож к шее любимой сестры". {n}Руолдо бросает ненавидящий взгляд в сторону Мейв.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Это была первая часть сделки. О второй — про устранение ненужных свидетелей — я, конечно же, умолчал. Нельзя оставлять в живых того, кто сдаст с потрохами, стоит приставить ножичек к шейке любимой сестры".

languages.text: "But the switch was only the first part of the deal. Naturally, I didn't mention the second part: the removal of witnesses. If someone is going to turn against you the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но обмен был первой частью сделки. О второй — про устранение ненужных свидетелей — я, конечно же, умолчал. Нельзя оставлять в живых того, кто сдаст тебя с потрохами, стоит приставить нож к шее любимой сестры". {n}Руолдо бросает ненавидящий взгляд в сторону Мейв.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "But the swap was only the first part of the deal. Naturally, I didn't mention the second part: the removal of unwanted witnesses. If someone will rat you out the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

"But the swap was only the first part of the deal. Naturally, I didn't mention the second part: the removal of unwanted witnesses. If someone will rat you out the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

If someone is going to rat you out the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

If someone is going to rat you out the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

"But the switch was only the first part of the deal. Naturally, I didn't mention the second part: the removal of witnesses. If someone is going to turn against you the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

"But the switch was only the first part of the deal. Naturally, I didn't mention the second part: the removal of witnesses. If someone is going to turn against you the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

languages.text: “不过，互换身份仅仅是交易的第一部分，而第二部分是消灭所有证人。自然，我没有和他提到这个部分，因为若是我在他心爱的妹妹喉咙上捅一刀，那他一定会在我身上捅一刀。像这样的人，我绝对不能留。”{n}罗尔多朝梅芙投去了充满恨意的目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But the switch was only the first part of the deal. Naturally, I didn't mention the second part: the removal of witnesses. If someone is going to turn against you the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不过，互换身份仅仅是交易的第一部分，而第二部分是消灭所有证人。自然，我没有和他提到这个部分，因为若是我在他心爱的妹妹喉咙上捅一刀，那他一定会在我身上捅一刀。像这样的人，我绝对不能留。”{n}罗尔多朝梅芙投去了充满恨意的目光。{/n}
“不过，互换身份仅仅是交易的第一部分，而第二部分是消灭所有证人。自然，我没有和他提到这个部分，因为若是我在他心爱的妹妹喉咙上捅一刀，那他一定会在我背后捅一刀。像这样的人，我绝对不能让他活着。”{n}罗尔多朝梅芙投去了充满恨意的目光。{/n}

languages.text: 「しかし、その交換は取引の最初の部分でしかなかった。もちろん、私は証拠の除去という第二の部分に言及しなかった。もし大切な妹の首にナイフが突きつけられた瞬間に裏切るような奴なら、生かしておくわけにはいかない」{n}ルオルドはメイヴの方に憎しみのこもった視線を投げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But the swap was only the first part of the deal. Naturally, I didn't mention the second part: the removal of witnesses. If someone is going to rat you out the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、その交換は取引の最初の部分でしかなかった。もちろん、私は証拠の除去という第二の部分に言及しなかった。もし大切な妹の首にナイフが突きつけられた瞬間に裏切るような奴なら、生かしておくわけにはいかない」{n}ルオルドはメイヴの方に憎しみのこもった視線を投げた。{/n}

languages.text: «Pero aquel cambio solamente era parte del trato. Como es lógico, no le mencioné la otra parte: la eliminación de testigos. Si alguien está dispuesto a volverse en tu contra en cuanto ponen un cuchillo en la garganta a su querida hermana, no te puedes permitir el lujo de dejar que viva». {n}Ruoldo lanza una mirada de odio a Maive.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But the switch was only the first part of the deal. Naturally, I didn't mention the second part: the removal of witnesses. If someone is going to turn against you the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero aquel cambio solamente era parte del trato. Como es lógico, no le mencioné la otra parte: la eliminación de testigos. Si alguien está dispuesto a volverse en tu contra en cuanto ponen un cuchillo en la garganta a su querida hermana, no te puedes permitir el lujo de dejar que viva». {n}Ruoldo lanza una mirada de odio a Maive.{/n}

«Pero aquel intercambio solamente era parte del trato. Como es lógico, no le mencioné la otra parte: la eliminación de testigos. Si alguien está dispuesto a delatarte en cuanto ponen un cuchillo en la garganta a su querida hermana, no te puedes permitir el lujo de dejar que viva». {n}Ruoldo lanza una mirada de odio a Maive.{/n}

languages.text: "Tabii değiş tokuş, anlaşmanın ilk kısmıydı. Doğal olarak ikinci kısmından, yani tanıkların ortadan kaldırılmasından bahsetmedim. Kardeşinin boğazına bıçak dayandığı anda sana ihanet edecek insanları hayatta tutmayı göze alamazsın ya." {n}Ruoldo, Maive'e nefret dolu bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But the switch was only the first part of the deal. Naturally, I didn't mention the second part: the removal of witnesses. If someone is going to turn against you the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Tabii değiş tokuş, anlaşmanın ilk kısmıydı. Doğal olarak ikinci kısmından, yani tanıkların ortadan kaldırılmasından bahsetmedim. Kardeşinin boğazına bıçak dayandığı anda sana ihanet edecek insanları hayatta tutmayı göze alamazsın ya." {n}Ruoldo, Maive'e nefret dolu bir bakış atıyor.{/n}

"Tabii takas, anlaşmanın ilk kısmıydı. Doğal olarak ikinci kısmından, yani tanıkların ortadan kaldırılmasından bahsetmedim. Kardeşinin boğazına bıçak dayandığı anda seni satacak olan insanları hayatta tutmayı göze alamazsın ya." {n}Ruoldo, Maive'e nefret dolu bir bakış atıyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Mais cet échange n'était que la première clause du marché. Naturellement, je n'ai pas évoqué la deuxième : l'élimination des témoins. Il n'est pas possible de laisser vivre quelqu'un qui est prêt à vous trahir à la minute où sa chère sœur se retrouve avec un couteau sous la gorge, » {n}dit Ruoldo en lançant un regard haineux en direction de Maive.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But the switch was only the first part of the deal. Naturally, I didn't mention the second part: the removal of witnesses. If someone is going to turn against you the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais cet échange n'était que la première clause du marché. Naturellement, je n'ai pas évoqué la deuxième : l'élimination des témoins. Il n'est pas possible de laisser vivre quelqu'un qui est prêt à vous trahir à la minute où sa chère sœur se retrouve avec un couteau sous la gorge, » {n}dit Ruoldo en lançant un regard haineux en direction de Maive.{/n}

« Mais cet échange n'était que la première clause du marché. Naturellement, je n'ai pas évoqué la deuxième : l'élimination des témoins. Il n'est pas possible de laisser vivre quelqu'un qui est prêt à vous dénoncer à la minute où sa chère sœur se retrouve avec un couteau sous la gorge, » {n}dit Ruoldo en lançant un regard haineux en direction de Maive.{/n}

languages.text: "Aber der Austausch war nur der erste Teil des Geschäfts. Den zweiten habe ich natürlich nicht erwähnt: die Beseitigung von Zeugen. Wenn sich jemand gegen Euch wendet, sobald seine geliebte Schwester ein Messer an der Kehle hat, könnt Ihr es Euch nicht leisten, ihn am Leben zu lassen." {n}Ruoldo wirft einen hasserfüllten Blick in Maives Richtung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But the switch was only the first part of the deal. Naturally, I didn't mention the second part: the removal of witnesses. If someone is going to turn against you the moment there's a knife at his beloved sister's throat, you can't afford to keep him alive." {n}Ruoldo casts a hateful glance in Maive's direction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber der Austausch war nur der erste Teil des Geschäfts. Den zweiten habe ich natürlich nicht erwähnt: die Beseitigung von Zeugen. Wenn sich jemand gegen Euch wendet, sobald seine geliebte Schwester ein Messer an der Kehle hat, könnt Ihr es Euch nicht leisten, ihn am Leben zu lassen." {n}Ruoldo wirft einen hasserfüllten Blick in Maives Richtung.{/n}

"Aber der Austausch war nur der erste Teil des Geschäfts. Den zweiten habe ich natürlich nicht erwähnt: die Beseitigung von Zeugen. Wenn jemand Euch verrät, sobald seine geliebte Schwester ein Messer an der Kehle hat, könnt Ihr es Euch nicht leisten, ihn am Leben zu lassen." {n}Ruoldo wirft einen hasserfüllten Blick in Maives Richtung.{/n}
